name: Association of Bermuda Insurers and Reinsurers
goal: Represent the interests of Bermuda's commercial property and casualty insurers on matters relating to insurance regulation, natural disasters and tax policy.
interests: Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: EU Solvency 2 implementation and equivalence rules and requirements. EU Code of Conduct, tax transparency and economic substance rules and requirements.
